pages.title: Resonance Extractor
pages.text: The <item>Resonance Extractor/$ is the main way of producing <thing>$(l:intro/beam)beams/$. It consumes items as fuel.$(br2)It consumes one item every cycle (4 ticks or fifth second), producing a <thing>$(l:intro/beam)beam/$ out the front. Different items produce different <thing>$(l:intro/beam)beams/$- with different amounts of <thing>energy/$, <thing>potential

<thing>/$, and <thing>stability/$. No items produce <thing>$(l:beam/void)void/$.$(br2)Most fuels last for 1 cycle. Some will last for multiple cycles, and will be shown in JEI as lasting X cycles. They will continue to output constant power for X cycles for each item consumed.$(br2)The <item>resonance extractor/$ can be disabled with a redstone signal.
